RelatedSentence: A court in Karachi on Monday dismissed a case of possession of illegal weapons against a US FBI agent .
Joel Cox was arrested on May 5 with bullets and three knives in the city 's Jinnah International Airport as he was checking in to board a flight to Islamabad .
District judge Hasan Kalwar dismissed the police charges , a court official said .
District judge Hasan Kalwar dismissed the police charges , a court official said .
The judge said the accused was not carrying a firearm and the anti-terrorism laws under which he was charged do not apply .
